name: Welcome To The FUNK Zone
description:
Once you're in the zone - there's no funking back.

Embark on a great adventure of DJ-ing for the most prestigious cyber-audiences as you defend the name of FUNK in an EDM-dominated world.

The game (currently) consists of three minigames, which shall tally up your score and define your FUNKY skills.

Partner in crime:

https://itch.io/profile/sircypkowskyy

Seizure warning just in case.

WHITE YELLOW RED
HOW NOT TO END UP DEAD
